panels.name: Average Rx rate(Mbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_rx_rate=*" as rx_rate | parse regex field=rx_rate "(?<Value>\d+\.\d+)(?<Unit>\w*)" |if(Unit=="Kb",0.00098,if(Unit=="Mb",1,if(Unit=="Gb",1024,if(Unit=="Tb",1024*1024,0)))) as factor
| Value*factor as total_rx_rate
|timeslice 5m 
|avg(total_rx_rate) by _timeslice,Gateway
|transpose row _timeslice column Gateway

panels.name: Average Tx rate(Kbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_tx_rate=*" as tx_rate | parse regex field=tx_rate "(?<Value>\d+\.\d+)(?<Unit>\w*)" |if(Unit=="Kb",0.00098,if(Unit=="Mb",1,if(Unit=="Gb",1024,if(Unit=="Tb",1024*1024,0)))) as factor
| Value*factor as total_tx_rate
|timeslice 5m 
|avg(total_tx_rate) by _timeslice,Gateway
|transpose row _timeslice column Gateway

panels.name: Average CPU utilization(%)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwSysStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "cpu_idle=* " as cpu_idle | 100-cpu_idle as cpu_time
|timeslice 5m 
|avg(cpu_time) by _timeslice,Gateway
|transpose row _timeslice column Gateway

panels.name: Disk usage(%)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwSysStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "disk_free=*" as disk_free | toLong(disk_free)
| parse "disk_total=* " as disk_total | toLong(disk_total)
| 100*(disk_total-disk_free)/disk_total as disk_usage
|timeslice 5m 
|last(disk_usage) as Disk_usage by _timeslice,Gateway
|transpose row _timeslice column Gateway

panels.name: TX Bytes
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "TXbytes=*" as txbytes 
|parse regex field=txbytes "(?<Value>\d+\.\d+)(?<Unit>\w*)" |if(Unit=="Kb",0.00098,if(Unit=="Mb",1,if(Unit=="Gb",1024,if(Unit=="Tb",1024*1024,0)))) as factor
|Value*factor as total_tx_bytes_Mb
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(total_tx_bytes_Mb) as TX_bytes_Mb by User

panels.name: VPN users(hh mm ss)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "Duration=*:*:*:*," as days,hr,min,sec
|days*86400+hr*3600+min*60+sec as dur 
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(dur) as Total_Dur by User
|floor(Total_Dur/3600) as hours | toLong(hours)
|floor(Total_Dur/60-hours*60) as minutes | toLong(minutes)
|floor(Total_Dur-hours*3600-minutes*60) as seconds | toLong(seconds)
|format ("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds) as Total_Time
|User as user
|sort Total_Dur 
|fields User,Total_Time

panels.name: Destination IPs
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=disconnected, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, PublicIP=*, Login=*, Logout=*," as User, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip,public_ip,login,logout| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(login,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC"))) as login_millis| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(logout,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"))) as logout_millis) as t1,
(parse "SRC=* DST=* LEN=* TOS=* PREC=* TTL=* ID=* DF PROTO=* SPT=* DPT=* " as src,dst,len,tos,prec,ttl,id,proto,spt,dpt) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| formatDate(t2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC") as time
|t1_user as user
| where t2__messagetime > t1_login_millis and t2__messagetime < t1_logout_millis
| t2_dst as Destination_IP
| count as Num_Connections by Destination_IP

panels.name: Accessed ports
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=disconnected, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, PublicIP=*, Login=*, Logout=*," as User, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip,public_ip,login,logout| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(login,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC"))) as login_millis| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(logout,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"))) as logout_millis) as t1,
(parse "SRC=* DST=* LEN=* TOS=* PREC=* TTL=* ID=* DF PROTO=* SPT=* DPT=* " as src,dst,len,tos,prec,ttl,id,proto,spt,dpt) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| formatDate(t2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC") as time
| where t2__messagetime > t1_login_millis and t2__messagetime < t1_logout_millis
|t1_user as user
| t2_dpt as Destination_Port
| count as Num_Connections by Destination_Port

panels.name: Traffic by SRC and DST IP
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=disconnected, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, PublicIP=*, Login=*, Logout=*," as User, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip,public_ip,login,logout| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(login,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC"))) as login_millis| toLong(toMillis(parseDate(logout,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"))) as logout_millis) as t1,
(parse "SRC=* DST=* " as src, dst) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| formatDate(t2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "UTC") as time
| where t2__messagetime > t1_login_millis and t2__messagetime < t1_logout_millis
|t1_user as user
|t2_src as Source_IP
|t2_dst as Destination_IP
| count by time,user,Source_IP,Destination_IP
| fields time,user,Source_IP,Destination_IP

panels.name: Rx Bytes
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "RXbytes=*" as rxbytes 
|parse regex field=rxbytes "(?<Value>\d+\.\d+)(?<Unit>\w*)" |if(Unit=="Kb",0.00098,if(Unit=="Mb",1,if(Unit=="Gb",1024,if(Unit=="Tb",1024*1024,0)))) as factor
|Value*factor as total_rx_bytes_Mb
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(total_rx_bytes_Mb) as RX_bytes_Mb by User

panels.name: Active VPN users count
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession
| parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway
| parse "User=*," as User
| parse "Status=*," as Status
| first(Status) as Status by Gateway, User
| where Status="active"
| count_distinct(User) as cnt|format("%d", cnt) as numActiveUsers | fields numActiveUsers

panels.name: Tunnels Down
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixTunnelStatusChange
| parse "new_state=* " as State
| parse "src_gw=* dst_gw" as src_gw
| parse "dst_gw=* old_state" as dst_gw
| if(src_gw >dst_gw,src_gw,dst_gw) as temp 
| if(src_gw<dst_gw,src_gw, dst_gw) as Gateway1
| temp as Gateway2
| first(State) as State by Gateway1,Gateway2 
| where State="Down" 
| count as cnt|format("%d", cnt) as numTunnelsDown | fields numTunnelsDown

panels.name: Tunnel Status History
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixTunnelStatusChange
| parse "new_state=* " as new_state
| parse "src_gw=* dst_gw" as src_gw
| parse "dst_gw=* old_state" as dst_gw
| parse "old_state=* " as old_state
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messageTime), "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as time
| if(new_state="Up",1,0) as State
| if(src_gw >dst_gw,src_gw,dst_gw) as temp | if(src_gw<dst_gw,src_gw, dst_gw) as Gateway1
| temp as Gateway2
| timeslice 5m
| concat(Gateway1,"<-->",Gateway2) as tunnel
| first(State) as StateChange by _timeslice,tunnel
| transpose row _timeslice column tunnel

panels.name: Tunnel Status
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixTunnelStatusChange
| parse "new_state=* " as State
| parse "src_gw=* dst_gw" as src_gw
| parse "dst_gw=* old_state" as dst_gw
| parse "latency=*" as lat
|format("%.2f",num(lat)) as Latency_sec
| if(src_gw >dst_gw,src_gw,dst_gw) as temp | if(src_gw<dst_gw,src_gw, dst_gw) as Gateway1
| temp as Gateway2
| parse regex field=Gateway1 "(?<gw1>\w+)\((?<gw1_vendor>\w+)\s(?<gw1_region>\S+)\)"
| parse regex field=Gateway2 "(?<gw2>\w+)\((?<gw2_vendor>\w+)\s(?<gw2_region>\S+)\)"
| if(gw1_vendor=gw2_vendor AND gw1_region=gw2_region,"Same cloud, Same region",if(gw1_vendor=gw2_vendor,"Same cloud, different region","Inter-Cloud")) as peering_type
| first(State) as State, first(Latency_sec) as Latency_sec, first(peering_type) as Peering_Type by Gateway1,Gateway2
| where State="Up" or State="Down"

panels.name: Active VPN Users
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession
| parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway
| parse "User=*," as User
| parse "Status=*," as Status
| first(Status) as Status by Gateway, User
| where Status="active"

panels.name: Tunnels Up
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixTunnelStatusChange
| parse "new_state=* " as State
| parse "src_gw=* dst_gw" as src_gw
| parse "dst_gw=* old_state" as dst_gw
| if(src_gw >dst_gw,src_gw,dst_gw) as temp 
| if(src_gw<dst_gw,src_gw, dst_gw) as Gateway1
| temp as Gateway2
| first(State) as State by Gateway1,Gateway2 
| where State="Up" 
| count as cnt|format("%d", cnt) as numTunnelsUp | fields numTunnelsUp

panels.name: Gateway count
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| count_distinct(Gateway) as cnt|format("%d", cnt) as numGw | fields numGw

panels.name: FQDN Accepted domain names
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixFQDNRule "process_http()" NOT "drop_reason"
| parse "Gateway=* " as Gateway
| parse "hostname=* " as hostname
| count as Num_connections by hostname

panels.name: FQDN Blocked domain names
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixFQDNRule "process_http()" "drop_reason"
| parse "Gateway=* " as Gateway
| parse "hostname=* " as hostname
| count by hostname

panels.name: Dropped packets
panels.queryString:
AvxRl D:| parse regex "AvxRl\s(?<Gateway>\w+)"
| parse "SRC=* " as SourceIP
| parse "DST=* " as DestinationIP
| parse "DPT=* " as DestinationPort nodrop
| parse "PROTO=* " as Protocol
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messageTime), "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as time
| count by time,Gateway,SourceIP,DestinationIP,DestinationPort,Protocol
| fields time,Gateway,SourceIP,DestinationIP,DestinationPort,Protocol
